item.title: Axprint Redesign
item.description: Redesign Axprint; Bring Art and Photo to Code! I’m redesign axprint.com . Old version of this site hosted on this URL Old axprint . I’ve…
item.content:encoded:
Redesign Axprint; Bring Art and Photo to Code!

I’m redesign axprint.com. Old version of this site hosted on this URL Old axprint.

I’ve used very useful and modern technology for redesign axprint such as:

  • sass - bourbon framwork,
  • Grunt,
  • FlexBox to grid system and product style mixin.

This redesign is very clean and consider the following has:

  • Golden Ratio, boxes, and all style such as padding, margins, …,
  • ModularScale font and typography,
  • Use the appropriate picture page content,
  • Use modern design.

item.title: Host Your Jekyll Theme on GitHub With CloudFlare
item.description: Create a CNAME file and upload it to your gh-pages repository. To do this, open your favourite text editor and type yout custom domain. Go…
item.content:encoded:
1. Create a CNAME file and upload it to your gh-pages repository.

  2. To do this, open your favourite text editor and type yout custom domain.

    www.pooyagolchian.ir
  3. Go to your CloudFlare account
  4. Follow like this image with your repo link, For example: pooya-golchian.github.io

Github IP adress:

192.30.252.153
192.30.252.154

CHEERS, your website hosted on GitHub :)

item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m Pooya Golchian Born 1990 in tehran/IRAN. Masters of Computer & Software engineering, Islamic Azad University, 2014-2017. My Projects…
item.content:encoded:
I’m Pooya Golchian

  • Born 1990 in tehran/IRAN.
  • Masters of Computer & Software engineering, Islamic Azad University, 2014-2017.

My Projects

AxPrint.com

Senior UI developer, Drupal developer, Linux Admin at axprint.com. 5 Sep 2015 - NOW

My project in axprint:

  • Build blog.axprint.com
  • Redesign axprint.com

  • Build axprint campaign landing page

    • Axprint coldseason campaign
    • Axprint pishgaman campaign
    • Axprint Alibaba campaign
    • Axprint Valentine’s Day campaign
    • Axprint fetr95 campaign

Rayvarz Software Engineering Company

UI Developer, Drupal Developer Rayvarz Software Engineering Company - 1year

My project in Rayvarz:

  • Build and design Rayvarz BPMS Portal drupal base

FlyFish 2D android game

Develope and design 2D android game, FlyFish released on IranApps FlyFish Game on IranApp.com Application store
